  • Constructor Details

    • Scenario

      public Scenario(String name, int size, int clusters, int survivors, String description, Asset[] assets)
      Constructor for a scenario
      Parameters:
      name - is the name of the scenario
      size - is the value of the x * x grid
      clusters - is the amount of groups that shall be placed on the grid
      survivors - is the amount of survivors. Must be larger than the clusters
      description - is the description of the scenario
      assets - is an array of all assets available in the scenario

    • Scenario

      public Scenario(Scenario scenario)
      This constructor is used for deep copying the given scenario.
      Parameters:
      scenario - scenario to deep copy
